languages.text: Пуритане дословно следуют доктринам и законам Империума. Для них недопустимо идти на компромиссы с ксеносами или использовать орудия врагов Человечества. Тех, кто полагает иначе, они считают за еретиков, которые заслуживают лишь суровой кары.

Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.
languages.original_text: Пуритане дословно следуют доктринам и законам Империума. Для них недопустимо идти на компромиссы с ксеносами или использовать орудия врагов Человечества. Тех, кто полагает иначе, они считают за еретиков, которые заслуживают лишь суровой кары.

traits.locale_text: Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.

Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.

Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.

Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.

languages.text: Puritaner befolgen die Doktrinen und Gesetze des Imperiums äußerst strikt. Kompromisse mit Xenos oder der Einsatz von Waffen, die von Feinden der Menschheit stammen, sind für sie Blasphemie. Wer anderer Meinung ist, gilt für sie als Ketzer, der die härtesten Strafen verdient.
languages.original_text: Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.

traits.locale_text: Puritaner befolgen die Doktrinen und Gesetze des Imperiums äußerst strikt. Kompromisse mit Xenos oder der Einsatz von Waffen, die von Feinden der Menschheit stammen, sind für sie Blasphemie. Wer anderer Meinung ist, gilt für sie als Ketzer, der die härtesten Strafen verdient.

languages.text: Les puritains suivent à la lettre les doctrines et les lois de l'Imperium. Parlementer avec des xénos ou utiliser les armes des ennemis de l'humanité est, pour eux, passible d'anathème. Quiconque suggère le contraire est perçu comme un hérétique ne méritant rien d'autre que le plus sévère des châtiments.
languages.original_text: Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.

traits.locale_text: Les puritains suivent à la lettre les doctrines et les lois de l'Imperium. Parlementer avec des xénos ou utiliser les armes des ennemis de l'humanité est, pour eux, passible d'anathème. Quiconque suggère le contraire est perçu comme un hérétique ne méritant rien d'autre que le plus sévère des châtiments.

languages.text: 纯净派会严格遵守帝国的教义和律法。对他们而言，与异形之间寻求妥协，或使用人类之敌的武器，都是不可原谅的邪恶之举。任何胆敢提出反对意见的人，都应该被视为异端份子，受到最严厉的惩处。
languages.original_text: Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.

traits.locale_text: 纯净派会严格遵守帝国的教义和律法。对他们而言，与异形之间寻求妥协，或使用人类之敌的武器，都是不可原谅的邪恶之举。任何胆敢提出反对意见的人，都应该被视为异端份子，受到最严厉的惩处。

languages.text: Los puritanos siguen las doctrinas y leyes del Imperium a rajatabla. Cualquier compromiso con los xenos les resulta anatema, al igual que la idea de usar las armas de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Cualquiera que sugiera algo por el estilo es un hereje que merece el mayor de los castigos.
languages.original_text: Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.

traits.locale_text: Los puritanos siguen las doctrinas y leyes del Imperium a rajatabla. Cualquier compromiso con los xenos les resulta anatema, al igual que la idea de usar las armas de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Cualquiera que sugiera algo por el estilo es un hereje que merece el mayor de los castigos.

languages.text: 純潔派は、帝国の教義と法律に忠実に従う。異種族に歩み寄ることや、人類の敵の武器を使うことは、彼らにとって受け入れ難いものだ。それに逆らった行為を匂わせる者は皆、最も厳しい罰を受けてもしかたのない異端者だと見なされる。
languages.original_text: Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.

traits.locale_text: 純潔派は、帝国の教義と法律に忠実に従う。異種族に歩み寄ることや、人類の敵の武器を使うことは、彼らにとって受け入れ難いものだ。それに逆らった行為を匂わせる者は皆、最も厳しい罰を受けてもしかたのない異端者だと見なされる。

languages.text: Püritenler, İmparatorluk'un öğretilerini ve yasalarını harfiyen uygularlar. Zenolarla uzlaşmak veya İnsanlığın düşmanlarının silahlarını kullanmak, onlar için katiyen söz konusu olamaz. Aksini iddia edeni ise en ağır cezaları hak eden bir kâfir olarak görürler.
languages.original_text: Puritans follow the doctrines and laws of the Imperium to the letter. Making compromises with xenos or using the weapons of the enemies of Humanity is anathema to them. Anyone who suggests otherwise they consider a heretic who deserves nothing but the severest punishment.
